Grep File String Pattern Create File ${testfile} foo\nbar\nfoo bar\nFoo
${file} Grep File ${testfile} foo
Fail Unless Equal ${file} foo\nfoo bar
Grep File Case insensitive Create File ${testfile} foo\nbar\nfoo bar\nFoo
${file} Grep File ${testfile} foo case insensitive
Fail Unless Equal ${file} foo\nfoo bar\nFoo
Grep File Simple Pattern Create File ${testfile} foo\nbar\nfoo bar\nFoo
${file} Grep File ${testfile} foo* simple
Fail Unless Equal ${file} foo\nfoo bar
${file} Grep File ${testfile} ?oo* simple
Fail Unless Equal ${file} foo\nfoo bar\nFoo
Grep File Glob Pattern Create File ${testfile} foo\nbar\nfoo bar\nFoo
${file} Grep File ${testfile} foo* glob
Fail Unless Equal ${file} foo\nfoo bar
Grep File Regexp Pattern Create File ${testfile} foo\nbar\nfoo bar\nFoo
${file} Grep File ${testfile} (?i)foo|bar regexp
Fail Unless Equal ${file} foo\nbar\nfoo bar\nFoo
Keyword Action Argument Argument Argument
Get And Check File [ Arguments ] ${path} ${expected}
${content} Get File ${path}
Fail Unless Equal ${content} ${expected}
